title: Structured Data Capture FHIR IG
introduction: The SDC (Structured Data Capture) specification is an Implementation Guide of the FHIR Specification that provides guidance on using the Questionnaire and QuestionnaireResponse resources.  It includes enhanced rendering capabilities, advanced flow control to manage questionnaire completion, calculated elements, ability to populate a questionnaire response from existing data, to extract data from a completed questionnaire response into other FHIR resources and the ability to interactively generate a questionnaire based on answers to previous questions.

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)

list.sequenceNote: Note: SDC STU2 and earlier was a US realm specification, and then later versions were elevated to a full international specification

Note: for this sequence, SDC was balloted as part of the FHIR specification, and these links are into the SDC page of the FHIR specification. Also note that this was DSTU 2 for the FHIR specification, but DSTU 1 for the SDC specification
